descriptions.hexcurse: Hexcurse is a ncurses-based console hexeditor written in C

descriptions.scc: Code counter with complexity calculations and COCOMO estimates

descriptions.jemalloc: Implementation of malloc emphasizing fragmentation avoidance
descriptions.readline: The GNU Readline library provides a set of functions for use by applications that allow users to edit command lines as they are typed in
descriptions.quilt: Quilt allows you to easily manage large numbers of patches by keeping track of the changes each patch makes. Patches can be applied, un-applied, refreshed, and more.
descriptions.snappy-c: This is a C port of the google snappy compressor. The compressor is very fast with reasonable compression ratio. It is mainly useful for projects that cannot integrate C++ code, but want snappy. Also contains a command line tool, a benchmark, random test code and a fuzz tester.
descriptions.libpsl: C library for the Public Suffix List
descriptions.hazelcast: Hazelcast is a unified, real-time data platform that combines a fast data store and a stream processing engine, all within a single cluster.
descriptions.grpc: gRPC is a remote procedure call framework
descriptions.minja: Minja is a minimalistic reimplementation of the Jinja templating engine to integrate in/with C++ LLM projects (it's used in llama.cpp)
descriptions.postgres: PostgreSQL is an advanced object-relational database management system that supports an extended subset of the SQL standard, including transactions, foreign keys, subqueries, triggers, user-defined types and functions
descriptions.rpm: The RPM Package Manager (RPM) is a powerful package management system capable of building computer software from source into easily distributable packages, installing, updating and uninstalling packaged software
descriptions.tcltls: This package provides an extension which implements Secure Socket Layer (SSL) and Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption over Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) network communication channels utilizing the OpenSSL library.
descriptions.blis: BLAS-like Library Instantiation Software Framework for z/OS
descriptions.libyaml: LibYAML is a YAML parser and emitter library
descriptions.httpd: The Apache HTTP Server is a powerful and flexible HTTP/1.1 compliant web server
descriptions.libsolv: Library for solving packages and reading repositories
descriptions.libpcap: libpcap is a network packet capture and filtering library. It allows applications to capture network traffic, filter packets based on various criteria, and save captured data to files
descriptions.stablediffusion: Stable Diffusion text to image AI model
descriptions.check: A unit testing framework for C
descriptions.crush: AI coding agent for your favourite terminal
descriptions.libkqueue: A user space implementation of the kqueue(2) kernel event notification mechanism libkqueue acts as a translator between the kevent structure and the native kernel facilities on Linux, Android, Solaris, and Windows.
descriptions.pv: Pipe Viewer - monitor data through a pipeline
descriptions.mc: Midnight Commander is a feature-rich visual file manager for Unix-like systems

descriptions.yamlcpp: A C++ library for parsing and emitting YAML.
descriptions.libpkgmanifest: Library for working with RPM manifests
descriptions.liboqs: liboqs provides a collection of open source implementations of quantum-safe key encapsulation mechanisms (KEMs) and digital signature algorithms; the full list can be found below a common API for these algorithms a test harness and benchmarking routines
